name: Personal Preferences SnCT
description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the personal preferences of the patient. This can include items such as prefered place of care, patients diet and communication method. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Finding' subset with subset original id 991000000139; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Finding simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000841000000107.
